definitions.definition: Any of various tropical American plants , of the genus Capsicum , principally the species Capsicum annuum and Capsicum frutescens , that are cultivated as edible peppers .

subdefinitions.definition: The non-spicy fruit of the above plants, such as the bell pepper .

main_definition: Any of various tropical American plants , of the genus Capsicum , principally the species Capsicum annuum and Capsicum frutescens , that are cultivated as edible peppers .
